subGroups.title: Identify System Functions
subGroups.description: Describe the overall behavior of the system.

subGroups.title: Distinguish System Goals
subGroups.description: What is the system intentionally designed to do?

subGroups.title: Identify Behaviors
subGroups.description: What are the actions or roles that each component of the system displays under various conditions?

subGroups.title: Design a System
subGroups.description: Thinking deeply about the state of an envisioned system and how the particular components that are available might need to interconnect for that state to be realized.

subGroups.title: Identify Interconnections
subGroups.description: The different ways that a systemâ€™s parts, or components, interact with each other through their behaviors and change the behaviors of other components through those interactions.

subGroups.title: Perceive Dynamics
subGroups.description: How do the components come together to perform a function (not necessarily the same thing as a goal)?

subGroups.title: Consider the Role of System Structure
subGroups.description: How are the components set up in relation to one another? This gives insight into the behavior of components. A system's structure affects the behaviors of its components and the overall dynamics of a system.

subGroups.title: Limited Resources
subGroups.description: In any system, it is important to understand which resources are finite, ones that will run out at a certain point?

subGroups.title: Fixes That Fail
subGroups.description: Any kind of solution to a problem that fixes the problem temporarily but fails fix it in the long term, and might even make it worse over time.

subGroups.title: Unintended Consequences
subGroups.description: The unexpected result of an action taken in a system. Unintended consequences are often the result of fixes that fail or someone aiming to find a leverage point in a system but not considering long-term implications to those actions.

subGroups.title: Leverage Points
subGroups.description: Particular places within a system where a small shift in one thing can produce big changes in everything.

achievements.title: Systems Novice
achievements.info: Student has shown proficiency at interconnecting the most basic pieces.

achievements.title: Systems Designer
achievements.info: Student has solved levels that require moderately difficult problem solving and mixing colors.

achievements.title: Interconnector
achievements.info: Student has mastered basic pieces as well as splitters and blenders and used them in conjunction to design tricky systems.

achievements.title: Dynamics Designer
achievements.info: Student has completed all basic levels and has a good grasp of how to leverage the abilities of all components.

achievements.title: Systems Fixer
achievements.info: Student has shown proficiency at solving levels taht are pre-populated with incorrect solutions.

achievements.title: Leverage Master
achievements.info: Student has shown proficiency at fixing incorrect solutions by finding the system's leverage point(s).

achievements.title: Structure Master
achievements.info: Student has designed systems that negotiate 3D space efficiently.

achievements.title: Resource Manager
achievements.info: Student has solved a considerable amount of the game's limited pieces levels.
